cgcloud__CP_Key_Type__c.name: cgcloud__CP_Key_Type__c
cgcloud__CP_Key_Type__c.description: The key type object is used in the complex pricing search strategy.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Consider_Account_Hierarchy__c.description: Specifies whether the condition is to be searched only in the trade org hierarchy of the orderer.

cgcloud__Consider_Account_Set__c.description: Specifies whether the business partner set is to be used as a key for condition finding.

cgcloud__Consider_Account__c.description: Specifies whether the business partner to be be used as a key for condition finding.

cgcloud__Consider_Product_Hierarchy__c.description: Specifies whether the condition is to be searched only in the product hierarchy.

cgcloud__Consider_Product_Set__c.description: Specifies whether the product set is to be used as a key for condition finding.

cgcloud__Consider_Promotion_Rewards__c.description: Specifies whether the reward is to be used as a key for condition finding.

cgcloud__Consider_Promotion__c.description: Specifies whether a valid promotion is to be used as a key for condition finding.

cgcloud__Consider_Sales_Org__c.description: Specifies whether the sales org is to be used as a key for condition finding.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Description based on the user-specified language.

cgcloud__Distribution_Category__c.description: Reference to the distribution category that's used to replicate the current key type.

cgcloud__Key_10__c.description: Specifies the mapping of key 10 with the attribute of an object.

cgcloud__Key_1__c.description: Specifies the mapping of key 1 with the attribute of an object.

cgcloud__Key_2__c.description: Specifies the mapping of key 2 with the attribute of an object.

cgcloud__Key_3__c.description: Specifies the mapping of key 3 with the attribute of an object.

cgcloud__Key_4__c.description: Specifies the mapping of key 4 with the attribute of an object.

cgcloud__Key_5__c.description: Specifies the mapping of key 5 with the attribute of an object.

cgcloud__Key_6__c.description: Specifies the mapping of key 6 with the attribute of an object.

cgcloud__Key_7__c.description: Specifies the mapping of key 7 with the attribute of an object.

cgcloud__Key_8__c.description: Specifies the mapping of key 8 with the attribute of an object.

cgcloud__Key_9__c.description: Specifies the mapping of key 9 with the attribute of an object.

cgcloud__Product_Hierarchy_Only__c.description: Specifies whether the condition is to be searched only in the product hierarchy.

cgcloud__Replication_Key__c.description: Defines the part of the merged key that's used to replicate the condition record.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Describes the sales organization to which the key type belongs.

cgcloud__Sort__c.description: Controls the position of condition key types in overviews.
